testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S-PromoteBuild-0001 User verifies that pipeline sync is successful when newVersionOnly is true on a resource in inputResources for a PromoteBuild step.
testcase.classclass: S-PromoteBuild-0001 User verifies that pipeline sync is successful when newVersionOnly is true on a resource in inputResources for a PromoteBuild step.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0002. A user runs a PromoteBuild on Linux step with status, comment, copy, and includeDependencies.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0002. A user runs a PromoteBuild on Linux step with status, comment, copy, and includeDependencies.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0003. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without an input BuildInfo resource and sync fails.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0003. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without an input BuildInfo resource and sync fails.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0004. A user adds a PromoteBuild step overriding the buildName and buildNumber variables. The step updates the correct build info.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0004. A user adds a PromoteBuild step overriding the buildName and buildNumber variables. The step updates the correct build info.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0005. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without targetRepository and sync fails.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0005. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without targetRepository and sync fails.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0006. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with a targetRepository that includes a variable and the step is successful.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0006. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with a targetRepository that includes a variable and the step is successful.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0007. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with status and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct status.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0007. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with status and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct status.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0008. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with status as a variable and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct status.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0008. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with status as a variable and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct status.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0009, A user adds a PromoteBuild step with comment and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct comment.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0009, A user adds a PromoteBuild step with comment and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct comment.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0010. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with a comment including a variable and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct comment.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0010. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with a comment including a variable and triggers the step. The step updates the build info with the correct comment.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0011. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with copy: true and triggers the step. The update copies the artifacts.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0011. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with copy: true and triggers the step. The update copies the artifacts.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0012. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with copy: ${variable}, where the variable is “true,” and triggers the step. The update copies the artifacts.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0012. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with copy: ${variable}, where the variable is “true,” and triggers the step. The update copies the artifacts.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0013. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without copy and triggers the step. The update moves and does not copy the artifacts.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0013. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without copy and triggers the step. The update moves and does not copy the artifacts.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0014. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with includeDependencies and triggers the step. The dependencies are included.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0014. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with includeDependencies and triggers the step. The dependencies are included.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0015. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with includeDependencies ${variable}, where the variable is “true,” and triggers the step. The dependencies are included.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0015. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with includeDependencies ${variable}, where the variable is “true,” and triggers the step. The dependencies are included.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0016. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without an output BuildInfo resource and sync fails.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0016. A user adds a PromoteBuild step without an output BuildInfo resource and sync fails.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0017. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with an output BuildInfo resource and triggers the step. The output resource is updated with the correct build name and number.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0017. A user adds a PromoteBuild step with an output BuildInfo resource and triggers the step. The output resource is updated with the correct build name and number.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0018. User can add a PromoteBuild step without specifying failOnValidate and it defaults to false. The step attempts to promote a build with an invalid artifact signature. The promotion is successful.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0018. User can add a PromoteBuild step without specifying failOnValidate and it defaults to false. The step attempts to promote a build with an invalid artifact signature. The promotion is successful.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0019. User can add a PromoteBuild step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to promote a build with an invalid artifacts. The promotion fails.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0019. User can add a PromoteBuild step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to promote a build with an invalid artifacts. The promotion fails.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0020. User can add a PromoteBuild step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to promote a build with a valid artifact signature. The promotion is successful
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0020. User can add a PromoteBuild step specifying failOnValidate as true. The step attempts to promote a build with a valid artifact signature. The promotion is successful

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S_PromoteBuild_0021. User can add a PromoteBuild step specifying failOnValidate as false. The step attempts to promote a build with an invalid artifact signature. The promotion is successful.
testcase.classclass: S_PromoteBuild_0021. User can add a PromoteBuild step specifying failOnValidate as false. The step attempts to promote a build with an invalid artifact signature. The promotion is successful.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S-PromoteBuild-5933-001 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo input resource at the pipeline level. Sync is successful.
testcase.classclass: S-PromoteBuild-5933-001 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo input resource at the pipeline level. Sync is successful.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S-PromoteBuild-5933-002 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo input resource at the pipeline level and another at the step level. Sync fails.
testcase.classclass: S-PromoteBuild-5933-002 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo input resource at the pipeline level and another at the step level. Sync fails.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S-PromoteBuild-5933-003 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo output resource at the pipeline level. Sync is successful.
testcase.classclass: S-PromoteBuild-5933-003 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo output resource at the pipeline level. Sync is successful.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S-PromoteBuild-5933-004 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo output resource at the pipeline level and another at the step level. Sync fails.
testcase.classclass: S-PromoteBuild-5933-004 User adds a PromoteBuild step with a BuildInfo output resource at the pipeline level and another at the step level. Sync fails.

testcase.class: PROMOTEBUILD_STEP - PromoteBuild Step Tests S-PromoteBuild-5933-005 User runs a PromoteBuild step with BuildInfo input and output resources at the pipeline level successfully.
testcase.classclass: S-PromoteBuild-5933-005 User runs a PromoteBuild step with BuildInfo input and output resources at the pipeline level successfully.
